overview:
My name is Rajeesh Nair. Professionally I am an Internet Marketing Consultant and Manager and Blogging is my passion. I blog about SEO, Internet Marketing all other internet stuff.

I love watching movies almost of all kind both Bollywood and Hollywood. I love to hang out with friends but currently I am quite a busy person and have tons to do in my life.

I am ambitious in life and have many dreams to conquer. I want to make my name famous in the internet world and one day I will. Wish me luck…
